title: University of Toronto to create AI role named after tech pioneer Geoffrey Hinton
description: The University of Toronto says it’s on the hunt for the next Geoffrey Hinton. The school says it will create a new chair role named after the Nobel laureate and artificial intelligence pioneer.
content:

title: Computers Made From Human Brain Tissue Are Coming. Are We Prepared?
description: As prominent artificial intelligence (AI) researchers eye limits to the current phase of the technology, a different approach is gaining attention: using living human brain cells as computational hardware.
content:

title: CEO Jensen Huang visits Republicans amid debate
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang met separately with U.S. President Donald Trump and Republican senators Wednesday as tech executives work to secure favorable federal policies for the artificial intelligence industry, including the limited sale of Nvidia’s highly valued computer chips to U.S. rivals like China.

title: Nvidia CEO Huang visits Republicans amid debate over AI race

title: Citadel Debuts New AI Tool For Equities Investors
description: Citadel, the hedge fund founded by billionaire Ken Griffin, has launched a new artificial intelligence-powered tool that aims to help investors conduct research on stocks faster and more efficiently, the firm's chief technology officer said.

title: Ottawa’s ‘refreshed’ AI strategy delayed to next year, minister says
description: Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon told a House of Commons committee the updated strategy will come next year, after saying in the fall it would come this year.
content:
Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon said Wednesday that an updated federal AI strategy is set to be released in 2026, a delay that he did not explain when testifying to parliamentarians.
